title: EZ Connect
description: EZ-Connect has been upgraded. ASUSTOR has launched a convenient web login service. Annoying router settings are no more! Simply open a web browser, use ASUSTOR Cloud ID + .ezconnect.to and connect to the NAS to access data anytime, anywhere. No matter where you are, as long as there is an Internet connection, you can log into your NAS using a web browser.
